author: Mayyu Ali
title: Rohingya Refugees Brace for a New Deadly Threat—Coronavirus
description: Having already endured a brutal military crackdown and displacement, Rohingya refugees now face the prospect of further devastation
content:
In the largest refugee settlement on earth, we are holding our breath.
On March 24, Cox’s Bazar, Bangladesh confirmed a COVID-19 case. It’s now just a matter of time before the outbreak reaches the nearby camps, where hundreds of thousands of Rohinyga refuge… [+4261 chars]
